participant_1.background:
I've been at my current job for six years, and I'm still learning new things every day.
I read my favorite book, The Little Prince, to the boy scouts.
i work all the time.
I live a quiet life and enjoy my own company.
I'm single, but I have a cat who is my best friend.

participant_2.background:
My hair is a vibrant shade of purple, which is perfect for my personality and my sense of style.
I'm a safari guide who loves to read in my spare time.
My pets are always excited to see me when I come home from work, even if I've only been gone for a few hours.
i do not drink alcohol.
I'm working on my car in the garage, and dreaming of Australia.

content.text: Hey there, how is your day going?
Hey there! It's going good, thanks for asking. How about yours?
It's going well, thank you! I'm just hanging out with my cat, reading a book.
That sounds nice! What book are you reading?
I'm reading The Little Prince. It's one of my favorites.
I've heard good things about that book. I'm a big reader myself. What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read all sorts of books, but I'm especially fond of fantasy and science fiction.
Me too! I love getting lost in a good book.
Me too! I feel like I can escape from the real world for a while when I'm reading.
That's exactly how I feel! What's your favorite fantasy or science fiction book?
It's hard to pick just one, but I'd say my favorite is The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy.
That's a great book! I love the humor in it.
Me too! It's one of those books that you can read over and over again and still find something new each time.
I agree! I've read it several times and I always find something new to laugh at.
It's a classic for a reason!
